snippet: St. Louis finally found a closer in the former catcher Jason Motte, and a July trade brought more pitchers to improve the bullpen.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis finally found a closer in the former catcher Jason Motte, and a July trade brought more pitchers to improve the bullpen.

headline.main: After Year of Tinkering, Cardinals’ Bullpen Takes Shape, Just in Time
headline.print_headline: After Year of Tinkering, Cardinals’ Bullpen Takes Shape, Just in Time
headline.seo: Cardinals’ Bullpen Takes Shape, Just in Time
